name: Jensen's Odds and Ends Delivery Service
name_original: Jensen's Odds and Ends Delivery Service
description:
@FranklinsGhost

Made for Tigsource Jam - Wholesome

Play with a toy car

Little game with no ending where you drag a car around like you're playing with it and do different tasks e.g. pick up a letter, watch the sky through a telescope...

Didn't get much time to work on this for the month so it's got plenty of bugs.

Controls

Arrow keys to navigate around
